exercises.name: Barbell Squats
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, barbell across upper back. Squat down until thighs are parallel to the ground, keeping back straight. Push through heels to return to standing.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on a bench with dumbbells in each hand. Lower dumbbells to chest, keeping elbows slightly bent. Push dumbbells back up to starting position.

exercises.name: Barbell Rows
exercises.instructions: Bend at the hips, keeping back straight, barbell in hands. Pull barbell towards chest, squeezing shoulder blades together. Lower slowly to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height. Press dumbbells straight up overhead, then lower slowly back to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
exercises.instructions: Stand with dumbbells at your sides. Curl dumbbells towards shoulders, keeping elbows close to your sides. Lower slowly to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Deadlifts
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, dumbbells in each hand. Keeping back straight, hinge at hips and lower dumbbells towards the ground. Push through heels to return to standing.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lunges
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides. Step forward with one leg, bending both knees to 90 degrees. Push off front foot to return to starting position. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows (single arm)
exercises.instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench, dumbbell in the other hand. Pull dumbbell towards chest, keeping back straight. Lower slowly to starting position. Alternate arms.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
exercises.instructions: Stand with dumbbells at your sides. Raise dumbbells out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows. Lower slowly to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Triceps Extensions
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell with both hands overhead. Lower dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows. Extend your arms back up to the starting position.

exercises.instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height. Press dumbbells straight up overhead, then lower slowly back to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides, stand with feet shoulder width apart. Raise onto your toes, squeezing your calves. Slowly lower back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
exercises.instructions: Stand with dumbbells at your sides. Raise dumbbells out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows. Lower slowly to starting position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Triceps Extensions
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell with both hands overhead. Lower dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows. Extend your arms back up to the starting position.
